content: {"name": "The Salvation Army Manhattan Citadel", "alternate_name": "", "description": "appointmednta can be made nay day of the week from 9am", "email": "", "url": "https://www.salvationarmyusa.org/usn/cure-hunger/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "175 East 125th Street", "address_2": null, "city": "New York", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10035", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.8042052, "longitude": -73.9358003}, "phones": [{"number": "(212) 860-3200", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}]}
